column4: So, when I upgraded to Ubuntu 8.04, Firefox 3 took over and a bunch of my extensions died because they're not computable, so my question is, how do I get firefox 2 back and have it work right?  I tried uninstalling FF3 from synaptic and then installing FF2, to no avail.
one way is  to grab the bin from mozzila and run off of it
ok.  Thanks, I'll look into that.
I looked into some things and figured out that I all I needed to get my stuff working was turn off the computability check for addons.
